title: Bond length from Morse potential diagram

content.question: Which of the following can be inferred from the diagram above that shows the dependence of potential energy on the internuclear distance between two atoms?

choices.label: The atoms form a bond with a bond length of <math alttext="25 picometers" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>25</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.3em"></mspace><mtext>pm</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>.

The atoms form a bond with a bond length of <math alttext="75 picometers" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>75</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.3em"></mspace><mtext>pm</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>.

The net force between the atoms is attractive at <math alttext="25 picometers" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>25</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.3em"></mspace><mtext>pm</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>.

The net force between the atoms is attractive at <math alttext="75 picometers" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>75</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.3em"></mspace><mtext>pm</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>.

content.answer: The atoms form a bond with a bond length of <math alttext="75 picometers" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>75</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.3em"></mspace><mtext>pm</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>.

skill.text: 5.D: Identify information presented graphically to solve a problem.
